text.0: How has Facebook's satisfaction of two opposing demands of flagging political propaganda and promoting itself as a “free marketplace of ideas” influenced the editorial content of fact-checking organisations in Nigeria? This research explains: https://t.co/PnCsMYBULH #DubawaChecks
text.1: We fact-checked former Aviation Minister, Femi Fani-Kayode’s claim about Oyo State’s landmass, population and size in relation to the eastern states in Nigeria and some European countries. Read here: https://t.co/LP0xq0wcb8 #DubawaChecks  #FactCheck
text.2: Have you read our weekly newsletter? We discussed the trend of fake social media accounts and how much impact it had on the #EndSARS protests. We also highlighted our fact-checks of the week and many more. Read here: https://t.co/i8YbFfhjmO #DubawaChecks #FactCheck
